channel.title: phil1988/freedi
channel.description: An open OS + display firmware for QIDI 3D printers

item.title: FreeDi v1.41 released
item.description:
### v1.41 has just been released!
This is a rather small update to wipe out some minor bugs and add a few tiny features.
## Instructions to Update:
**Click update** ðŸ˜‰ ![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/27305af0-a96d-40be-bd38-ebc48e2d19b1)
### For the 3 macros ( PRINT_END, CANCEL_PRINT and M107): Go to the [config_section](https://github.com/Phil1988/FreeDi/tree/master/config_section) and get the matching macro for your printer (copy the macro and replace yours)
